column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We ordered the baked goat cheese with marinara
column2: which came with buttered toast that was delicious. The roast chicken was moist and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside
column3: almost as crispy as the skin on a Peking duck on
column4: which requires real skill! I had the short rib stroganoff
column5: which had an amazing cream sauce
column6: and the short rib basically melted in my mouth
column7: it was so tender! I ordered a side of the Elote corn
column8: of which I wasn't expecting the sour taste. It was interesting
column9: but I would pass on it the next time around.
